title: error when running zk stack init with sepolia network.
body:
### üêõ error when running zk stack init

#### üìù When I run zk stack init sometime it work very correctly but most of the time it produces error when Running `target/release/zksync_server --genesis`
   
#### üîÑ Reproduction Steps

Steps to reproduce the behaviour
clone the repo
cd into the repo
zk
zk stack init 

configure new sepolia network

#### üñ•Ô∏è Environment
linux ~ Ubuntu 22.04 
Any relevant environment details.


#### üìé Log Output

   ```Compiling multivm v0.1.0 (/home/ubuntu/zeeve/zksync-era/core/lib/multivm)
   Compiling zksync_server v0.1.0 (/home/ubuntu/zeeve/zksync-era/core/bin/zksync_server)
    Finished release [optimized] target(s) in 13m 45s
     Running `target/release/zksync_server --genesis`
2023-12-20T15:13:44.545468Z  INFO zksync_server: No sentry URL was provided
2023-12-20T15:13:44.555750Z  INFO zksync_dal::connection: Created pool with 1 max connections and None statement timeout
Error: genesis_init

Caused by:
    0: Call to contract failed: Abi error: Invalid name: please ensure the contract and method you're calling exist! failed to decode empty bytes. if you're using jsonrpc this is likely due to jsonrpc returning `0x` in case contract or method don't exist
    1: Abi error: Invalid name: please ensure the contract and method you're calling exist! failed to decode empty bytes. if you're using jsonrpc this is likely due to jsonrpc returning `0x` in case contract or method don't exist
    2: Invalid name: please ensure the contract and method you're calling exist! failed to decode empty bytes. if you're using jsonrpc this is likely due to jsonrpc returning `0x` in case contract or method don't exist

Stack backtrace:
   0: anyhow::error::<impl core::convert::From<E> for anyhow::Error>::from
   1: zksync_core::genesis_init::{{closure}}
   2: zksync_server::main::{{closure}}
   3: tokio::runtime::park::CachedParkThread::block_on
   4: tokio::runtime::runtime::Runtime::block_on
   5: zksync_server::main
   6: std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace
   7: std::rt::lang_start::{{closure}}
   8: core::ops::function::impls::<impl core::ops::function::FnOnce<A> for &F>::call_once
             at /rustc/5c6a7e71cd66705c31c9af94077901a220f0870c/library/core/src/ops/function.rs:284:13
   9: std::panicking::try::do_call
             at /rustc/5c6a7e71cd66705c31c9af94077901a220f0870c/library/std/src/panicking.rs:524:40
  10: std::panicking::try
             at /rustc/5c6a7e71cd66705c31c9af94077901a220f0870c/library/std/src/panicking.rs:488:19
  11: std::panic::catch_unwind
             at /rustc/5c6a7e71cd66705c31c9af94077901a220f0870c/library/std/src/panic.rs:142:14
  12: std::rt::lang_start_internal::{{closure}}
             at /rustc/5c6a7e71cd66705c31c9af94077901a220f0870c/library/std/src/rt.rs:148:48

             at /rustc/5c6a7e71cd66705c31c9af94077901a220f0870c/library/std/src/panicking.rs:524:40
  14: std::panicking::try
             at /rustc/5c6a7e71cd66705c31c9af94077901a220f0870c/library/std/src/panicking.rs:488:19
